csw:Record.dc:title: Arctic Ocean - Temperature and salinity Historical Data Collection SeaDataCloud V1
csw:Record.dc:subject: Oceanographic geographical features
Temperature of the water column
Salinity of the water column
ITS-90 water temperature
Water body salinity
Arctic Ocean
oceans
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
SeaDataCloud Temperature and Salinity historical data collection for the Arctic Ocean, including revised quality flags after quality control with ODV. The dataset format is ODV binary collections. You can read, analyse and export from the ODV application provided by Alfred Wegener institute at http://odv.awi.de/.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org/.

csw:Record.dc:source: The data used as input for this product have been extracted from the SeadataNet Download Service: http://www.seadatanet.org/Data-Access/Common-Data-Index-CDI
